name: .ANIMSET File Extension
summary: Learn about .ANIMSET files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Facial animation file created by FaceFX, a program used for animating facial expressions in video games; often stores an animation that is synchronized with human speech audio; enables realistic lip-synching for virtual video game characters.

content: When you are finished designing an animation set, you can publish it to an .ANIMSET_INGAME file, which stores the stripped down version of the ANIMSET file that is suitable for use in the target game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
